sentences.english: Larvae – Woolly bear caterpillars curl up in thick layers of leaf litter for winter.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲期燈蛾毛蟲在冬天會裹在厚厚幾層的落葉中。

sentences.english: The desire of the moth for the star.
sentences.chinese: 這是燈蛾對星光的嚮往。

definition: to banish from the court/to relegate
the fabled roc flies ten thousand miles (idiom)/one's future prospects are brilliant
(literary) (of a married woman) to visit one's parents
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart
